title: Want to trade for T206 White Cap Mathewson Old Mill or EPDG Back??
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Want to trade for T206 White Cap Mathewson Old Mill or EPDG Back??
posts.post_content:
I know it is like a needle in a haystack, but I would like to see if one will surface.  Looking for VG or VGEX.
Thanks for pointing out the below Jim.  I peaked at my sheet a little to quickly and didn't have my boxes lined up!  How about an EPDG??
Let me know.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Matty Carolina Bright will only be found on the dark cap Matty-tough combo but they are out there

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=14896&d=1267491805[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=14897&d=1267491816[/IMG]
it can be found with brown hindu though.
